name: MT? Eesti Apteekide ?hendus
membership:
Pharmaceutical Group of the European Union, PGEU
http://www.pgeu.eu/en/pgeu/members.html
goal:
The Estonian Pharmacies Association is founded to:
a) protect the interests of its member pharmacies in Estonia and abroad;
b) provide additional education or courses to pharmacists;
c) stand for the development of the pharmacy sector nationally;
d) benefit to the goal of achieving a high quality in pharmacy services nationwide;
e) create contacts with international organisations;
f) create contacts with Estonian charity organisations to promote their activities;
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
1. Falisified Medicines directive and the subsequent delegated act.
2. Any initiative regarding SGEI, especially relating to implementation of Art 14 of TFEU;
3. Proportionality directive
4. Infringements regarding pharmacy ownership rules
5. YA state aid case
